content: I saw a film about Desert Dawg at the Banff Mountain Film Festival World Tour, and his human was talking about how loving a dog makes you a better person. He said something like: you give them a few years of your life, and they give you all of theirs. Your piece just made me choke up even more than that one. It’s just turning cool in Brisbane now, and Miss Rose is very cuddly and affectionate, and I am totally cashing in on that. Blessings to you and your pooch.
